mapper.select: SELECT OD.SALES_POST_ID, SP.TITLE AS SALES_POST_TITLE, SP.DESCRIPTION AS SALES_POST_DESCRIPTION, PF.FILE_PATH, P.PRICE AS UNIT_PRICE, -- 단일 제품 가격 SUM(OD.QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY FROM ORDER_DETAIL_TB OD JOIN SALES_POST_TB SP ON OD.SALES_POST_ID = SP.ID JOIN SALES_POST_FILE_TB PF ON SP.ID = PF.SALES_POST_ID JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON SP.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER GROUP BY OD.SALES_POST_ID, SP.TITLE, SP.DESCRIPTION, PF.FILE_PATH, P.PRICE ORDER BY ORDER_QUANTITY DESC
